English:
<size=200%><color=red>>...We're running out of resources...</color></size>
>...At least we have the foam grenades, might as well put them to good use.
Description: Don't translate the text in between the "<>" tags.

French.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>... On va tomber à court de ressources...</color></size>
>... Au moins, il nous reste les grenades à mousse. Autant les utiliser à bon escient.

Italian.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>...Stiamo finendo le risorse...</color></size>
>...Almeno abbiamo le granate a schiuma, tanto vale sfruttarle.

German.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>… Unsere Ressourcen werden knapp …</color></size>
>… Immerhin haben wir die Foam-Granaten, dann können wir die auch sinnvoll einsetzen.

Spanish.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>Nos estamos quedando sin recurso...</color></size>
>Por lo menos, nos quedan las granadas de espuma. Será mejor aprovecharlas.

Russian.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>...Ресурсы на исходе.</color></size>
>...Ну хоть пенные гранаты остались. Еще могут пригодиться.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>...Estamos ficando sem recursos...</color></size>
>...Pelo menos ainda temos as granadas de espuma, talvez seja a hora de começar a usar.

Polish.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>...Kończą się nam zasoby...</color></size>
>...Mamy przynajmniej granaty piankowe, pora zrobić z nich dobry użytek.

Japanese.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>...リソースがなくなりそうだ...</color></size>
>...少なくともフォームグレネードはある。うまく使おう。

Korean.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>...자원이 부족하다...</color></size>
>...적어도 품 수류탄은 있으니 잘 사용해야지.

Chinese_Traditional.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>…資源快耗盡了……</color></size>
>…幸好還有泡沫榴彈，不用白不用。

Chinese_Simplified.Translation:
<size=200%><color=red>>...我们的资源不够了...</color></size>
>...至少我们有结沫弹，不妨好好利用它们。

name: Rundown004_A3_RoleplayWardenIntel
